abstract: A big sell-off Thursday, followed by another sizable decline Friday, put the week in a memorably miserable class.
snippet: A big sell-off Thursday, followed by another sizable decline Friday, put the week in a memorably miserable class.
lead_paragraph: It was a very bad week for the stock market. By some measurements, it was the worst week in several years.

headline.main: Stocks Tumble to Worst Week in Several Years
headline.print_headline: Stocks Tumble to Worst Week in Several Years
